articles.description: Glowing green and gold, NGC 6822, could teach us a lot about the ancient, metal-poor universe.
articles.content:
The James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) has imaged a galaxy neighboring the Milky Way in stunning detail. 
Located around 1.5 million light-years away from Earth, the irregular-shaped galaxy, NGC 6822… [+3843 chars]
